features: STAINLESS STEEL INDUCTION PLATE: Each pan has a steel induction plate for rapid, even heat distribution from edge to edge. Your meals cook to even perfection without hot spots. Use in the oven or on any stovetop: electric, induction, ceramic & gas

PTFE & PFOA FREE: Cerami-Tech is Copper Chef’s exclusive non-stick ceramic coating. It’s so super nonstick, nothing sticks to the surface of your skillet, not even burnt cheese! Plus, there’s no butter or oil required. This pan is not pre-seasoned. Clean-up is easy because there’s no residue left behind. Dishwasher Safe.
HARD-ANODIZED PANS: Heavy-duty aluminum construction is hard anodized for maximum durability, ultimate strength and professional performance.
body.description: COPPER CHEF 8" ROUND COPPER CHEF PAN COOKS WITHOUT OIL OR BUTTER.CERAMI-TECH NON-STICK COATING MAKES FOR NON-STICK COOKING AND EASY CLEAN-UP.PFOA, PTFE & PFOS-FREE. HEAT RESISTANT UP TO 800°

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Revolutionary Nonstick Frying Pan New Cerami-Tech Non-Stick Cerami-Tech Technology with 5 layer construction means nothing sticks to the surface of the pan, making clean up a breeze. Less Fat - Fewer Calories - No Guilt. Mouthwatering meals are effortless without added fats, an ideal choice for healthy cooking every day. Works In Your Oven As Well Sear a steak on your stovetop, then bake to your desired degree of doneness – all from the same pan. More Features Heat Resistant Up To 850° F Cerami-Tech Non-Stick Outer Coating Riveted Handles For Extra-Secure Grip Stainless Steel Induction Plate For Even Heat Distribution Heavy-Duty 5-Layer Construction Works On All Stove Tops: Gas, Electric, Ceramic & Induction Dishwasher Safe

Features Non-Stick Ceramic Coating The breakthrough, all-in-one kitchen miracle: bake, fry, broil and saute! Copper Chef's Cerami-Tech Non-Stick Technology lets you cook without added oils and easy clean-up. Heat Resistant Copper Chef works on all stovetops and is heat resistant up to 850°. From stovetop to oven to tabletop, Copper Chef will simplify your kitchen. Oven Safe With Copper Chef's round design, large cooking capacity, and even heat distribution you will enjoy perfectly cooked meals from oven to table. Fry Frying foods has never been easier. With even heat distribution, food will be perfectly browned and crispy. The Copper Chef's special design allows you to drain off excess oil for crispy results without all the grease.

Copper Chef's Conception One of the things my customers always seem to want is to pare down the amount of pots and pans they have in their kitchen cabinets. So we brought you an Round Frying Pan that seriously replaces most other pans in the kitchen. Most people want a pan that is not too heavy, free from harmful chemicals, nonstick for easy clean-up, and can stand up to the rigors of the hot oven. Copper Is The New Gold The award winning Copper Chef is unique and versatile. From it's functionality to its design, the Copper Chef is the perfect addition to your kitchen. With over 1 Million Copper Chef pans sold, kitchens across the world are gleaming with Copper. New Ceramic Technology Get a restaurant-grade Round Fry Pan in the perfect size for every meal— no matter how big or small! Cerami-Tech Non-Stick coating makes pan-frying, sautéing & more fast and effortless because nothing sticks to the surface! Stainless Steel Induction Plate ensures even heat distribution every time so every meal is cooked to tender perfection with no hot spots. Plus, clean-up is a breeze with no scrubbing or soaking required afterwards! Healthier Cooking Succulent, home-cooked meals without added fats or oils are fast & easy. Goes from any stove top to oven to table with 850° F heat resistance. Stainless steel induction plate gives you superior heat conduction and perfect, even cooking every single time. Perfect for any cooking surface: electric, gas, ceramic, or induction. Includes tempered glass lid.

Why Copper Chef? Are you looking of the one pan to replace them all? Are you looking for a safe and healthy way to enjoy the ease and versatility of non stick cookware? From stovetop, to oven, to tabletop Copper Chef will out perform every time, with it's impressive heat distribution, and Cerami-Tech coating the stickiest of meals will slide right off and wipe right out. What's In Your Kitchen?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks, cleans up, and looks great
reviews.reviewText: When I first received this pan and saw how thin it was compared to Calphalon pans, I was going to return it. Then I tried cooking in it and was amazed. It heats up fast and delivers heat evenly. It's very lightweight and totally non-stick. Super easy to clean. Food just slides off it. I was so impressed I ordered a second one and find them both very handy. As my other cookware wears out, I am going to order more in this brand. It is also a very nice looking pan, which is important since I hang my cookware on a kitchen rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well with my induction range
reviews.reviewText: I have been using very little or no oil frying eggs or dumplings using this pan. It doesn't stick. It's lightweight and easy to clean. It seems sturdy and so far I haven't got any dents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, very sturdy, no cleaning, or scrubbing. This pan the food just slides right out, with minimal oil. Would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lasted well for a year and a half
reviews.reviewText: I have really enjoyed this 8 inch copper pan. It made great omelets! Kind of past tense. I have reconditioned it twice as per directions but the non-stick is gone from it. Because it is not terribly expense and because I have really liked it until now, I am going to order a new one. It will not be non-stick forever in my experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Just used this for sautéed paneer. Worked wonderfully.Easy clean up, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality heavy weight pan. The nonstick is excellent. I use it almost every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality and size is also very good easy to clean good thing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks eggs like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for omelets. Nonstick surface allows eggs to slide right out. Easy cleaning. Love this pan.
nothing gets suck to it, great, good buy
No se pega y no se calienta el agarrador del sartén lo que si es con temperatura media baja

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This pan is tiny but it is amazing! You hardly need to rinse it. It has become my dedicated eggs and seed toasting pan. I‘ve had it a few months so early days but I’m caring for the ceramic chemical-free lining as I am loving how non-stick it is. Cute and easy.

When I first used it was great and I was going to review as the best pan. However, after about 3 times it started to stick a little and now I can't do eggs without leaving most of it on the pan. I always use it on medium heat so i dont overheat it. Useless. Had to buy a new one (not the same) yesterday
